title: Laura Kavanagh, NYCâ€™s First Woman Fire Commissioner, Takes Command
description: Laura Kavanagh has never been a firefighter, but has deep experience with the department and the city. She oversees 17,370 people, and is the youngest leader in a century.
dc:creator: Chelsia Rose Marcius
media:credit: Jeenah Moon for The New York Times
media:description: Laura Kavanagh handled three line-of-duty deaths during her eight-month tenure as acting commissioner.
